text: Mikhail Vladimirovich Studenetsky (; 6 March 1934– 1 March 2021) was a Soviet basketball player. He was a point guard of the Soviet team between 1954 and 1959. He won a silver medal at the 1956 Summer Olympics, He was born in Moscow. Studenetsky died on 1 March 2021 in Moscow, aged 86.Умер серебряный призер Олимпиады-1956 Михаил Студенецкий ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Medalists at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Point guards Category:Russian basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Moscow Category:Soviet basketball players
title: Mikhail Studenetsky
